meanings.sent1: The undocile puppy kept running away from its owner.
meanings.sent2: The wild horse was undocile and refused to be tamed.
meanings.sent3: The undocile toddler thought it was a game to evade bedtime.
meanings.sent4: Her undocile hair refused to stay in place no matter how much she brushed it.
meanings.sent5: The undocile river flooded its banks, ignoring all attempts to contain it.

meanings.sent1: The undocile cat refused to come when called.
meanings.sent2: The undocile student kept talking during the lesson.
meanings.sent3: The undocile squirrel stole nuts from the bird feeder despite being scolded.
meanings.sent4: His undocile spirit rebelled against any form of authority.
meanings.sent5: The undocile wind howled through the night, ignoring any attempts to calm it.
